Language.name: English
Language.changeColor: Tap on model to change its color
Language.rotate: Use swipe to rotate the model
Language.move: Hold your finger on model to change its position
Language.minionSpeak: Minions speak a mixture of Spanish, Italian, English, French and Indian languages. Also, there are elements of Russian and Korean in their language.
Language.minionHeads: Minions have only hairstyle types, including absolutely bald.
Language.minionPropeties: ÐœMinions are able to survive under the radiation, ultra-low pressure, with no air and sub-zero temperatures.
Language.floorTap: Do the long touch with your finger to set the points on the floor
Language.floorChanger: Use special buttons to change the tile model
